::KitKat::

She looked at Etchingar. "Say, could you do me a favor Etchingar.
It's very important. I need to know what special skills you have.  In 
chemicals, weapons, fighting, computers, anything.  I want to know 
what you can do so I know where best to place you for this plan to 
work. Please tell me, what is it that you can do?" 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Etchingar looked confused. He kicked a rock into the wall. He had 
been
> kicking that rock around all day, and there is only scary or stupid 
shows on
> TV, and he needed to do something to keep his mind sober...
